title: Death by Revelation
description: Alternate cover edition for ASIN: B00DW7R8P8In the shadows of a derelict beachfront apartment, a woman finds the crouching form of her cousin, dead by her own hand. But what brought about the decision to die?The irrational promptings are the ones that can lead to the deepest truths, and for Bella Marx, these are bound up with a disturbing sense that someone—a person unknown—was involved in this most final of decisions. There is a story within the story, and ambiguities, uncertainties, and questions of identity are the conditions of Bella’s search. From Venice Beach to Berkeley and San Francisco’s western edge, she follows a tenuous thread of taunting and sinister clues in a journey of revenge and self-discovery.Suicide can be murder.
author: K.M. Wood
